      • lookUpConsentMasterData

        @Deprecated
public LookUpMasterData lookUpConsentMasterData(android.content.Context context,
                                                            java.lang.String consentType,
                                                            java.lang.String legalEntityCode,
                                                            java.lang.String language,
                                                            java.lang.String isoA2Code)
        Deprecated. 
        Look up master data with the type LookUpMasterDataRequest.CONSENT_VERSION. This call will ignore the specified Service and will use only SCV.
        Parameters:
        consentType - Possible values allowed are AMF, ASF, ABF,ADF
        legalEntityCode - Valid code for legal entity in SCV
        language - Valid ISO country code as present in SCV database
        isoA2Code - The ISO 3166-A2 code of the country of the site
        Returns:
        look up master data action
        See Also:
        Country & Language Codes for Consent Master Data Lookup

      • lookUpMasterData

        public LookUpMasterData lookUpMasterData(android.content.Context context,
                                         LookUpMasterDataRequest request)
        Retrieve the Master Data containing the minimun legal age needed for every Country. This call will ignore the specified Service and will use only SCV.

      • refreshAuthToken

        public java.lang.String refreshAuthToken()
                                  throws AuthenticationException
        Synchronously refreshes the auth token of the user account. Refresh token is needed for this action. If it's missing then null is returned.
        Returns:
        auth token
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException

      • getEmailForLoggedInUser

        public java.lang.String getEmailForLoggedInUser()

        Returns:
        String containing the email address.

      • getSession

        public SessionData getSession()
        Method that returns session information
        Returns:
        SessionData object containing accessToken, expireTime, refreshToken and tokenType.
